0: RESOLUTION ORGANIZING THE PHILIPPINES-ROMANIA PARLIAMENTARIANS' FRIENDSHIP SOCIETY
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00702
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION ORGANIZING THE PHILIPPINES-ROMANIA PARLIAMENTARIANS' FRIENDSHIP SOCIETY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA
DATE FILED : 2017-01-18
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Tabled by the Committee on 2017-02-06
          -Adopted House Resolution No. 102, entitled "RESOLUTION ORGANIZING THE PHILIPPINES-ROMANIA PARLIAMENTARIANS' FRIENDSHIP ASSOCIATION" on 2005-10-11; Needs reconstitution of Members by nomination for the 17th Congress
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INTERPARLIAMENTARY RELATIONS AND DIPLOMACY ON 2017-01-24
